field.property: Label;Caption=Attention!! X=12 Y=2 Height=2 Width=148 ForeColor=0 Justification=2

field.output: You have just modified the dbdict for a file that has been converted to a SQL file. Depending on the type of change that was made, you may need to make changes to the external database or to the SQL mapping information. For additional information, see the Service Manager Relational Database Interface manual.
field.property: Wlabel;Caption=You have just modified the dbdict for a file that has been converted to a SQL file. Depending on the type of change that was made, you may need to make changes to the external database or to the SQL mapping information. For additional information, see the Service Manager Relational Database Interface manual. X=12 Y=6 Height=10 Width=148 ForeColor=0 ArrayLength=5

field.output: If you have added a new field, you will need to add a column to one of the tables being mapped to by this file. You must then update the SQL mapping for that field.
field.property: Wlabel;Caption=If you have added a new field, you will need to add a column to one of the tables being mapped to by this file. You must then update the SQL mapping for that field. X=12 Y=16 Height=6 Width=148 ForeColor=0 ArrayLength=3

field.output: If you have changed the data type of a field, you may need to change the data type of the column it is mapped to.
field.property: Wlabel;Caption=If you have changed the data type of a field, you may need to change the data type of the column it is mapped to. X=12 Y=22 Height=4 Width=148 ForeColor=0 ArrayLength=2

field.output: If you have modified the keys in the file, you will need to make the appropriate changes to the indices in the external database.
field.property: Wlabel;Caption=If you have modified the keys in the file, you will need to make the appropriate changes to the indices in the external database. X=12 Y=26 Height=4 Width=148 ForeColor=0 ArrayLength=2
Label;Caption=Press ENTER to continue. X=12 Y=30 Height=2 Width=148 ForeColor=0
